pkgmetadata.longdescription: # JSON-RPC 2.0 Objects[![Code style: black](https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-black-000000.svg)](https://github.com/psf/black)[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-blue.svg)](https://mit-license.org/)A collection of objects for use in JSON-RPC 2.0 implementations.## Installation```shellpoetry add jsonrpc2-objects``````shellpip install jsonrpc2-objects```## ObjectsAvailable in `objects` are the following:| Object | Description ||--------------------|-----------------------------|| ParamsRequest | Request with params || Request | Request without params || ParamsNotification | Notification with params || Notification | Notification without params || ErrorResponse | Response with result || ResultResponse | Response with error |## ErrorsPython exceptions are available for each JSON-RPC 2.0 error. Each errorextends `JSONRPCError`.- JSONRPCError- InternalError- InvalidParams- InvalidRequest- MethodNotFound- ParseError- ServerError
